snippet: Representative Vern Buchanan, Republican of Florida, was cleared of wrongdoing in failing to fully disclose all his financial interests, but a separate investigation is continuing.
abstract: House ethics committee dismisses allegations that Republican Rep Vern Buchanan of Florida failed to properly disclose some of his financial holdings, but it is continuing to examine a more serious set of accusations against him centering on possible campaign finance violations.
lead_paragraph: Representative Vern Buchanan, Republican of Florida, was cleared of wrongdoing in failing to fully disclose all his financial interests, but a separate investigation is continuing.

headline.seo: House Ethics Committee Clears Buchanan in Part of Finances Case
headline.main: Panel Clears Legislator in Part of Ethics Case
headline.print_headline: Panel Clears Legislator in Part of Ethics Case
